tool_description: Explore the world with our comprehensive Geographical Data API. Retrieve detailed information about countries, states/counties, and cities worldwide. Perfect for developers, this API provides access to a wealth of geographic data to enhance your applications.
name: Countries, States and Cities
title: Countries, States and Cities

api_list.name: Find Nearby Cities
api_list.description: You can search for close cities from a specified City Id and a Radius (in KM).

api_list.name: City
api_list.description: Get city detailed info based on its ID. You can get the id from the cities endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countries-states-and-cities.p.rapidapi.com/cities/1234"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countries-states-and-cities.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://countries-states-and-cities.p.rapidapi.com/cities/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countries-states-and-cities.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: State
api_list.description: Get a state info base on the country_code and the state_code. Ex: BR/SP for São Paulo in Brazil or US/CA for California in the US.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countries-states-and-cities.p.rapidapi.com/states/US/CA"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countries-states-and-cities.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://countries-states-and-cities.p.rapidapi.com/states/{country}/{state}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countries-states-and-cities.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Country
api_list.description: In this endpoint you can reach the detailed Country by its country_code Ex: BR, US, AL.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countries-states-and-cities.p.rapidapi.com/countries/BR"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countries-states-and-cities.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://countries-states-and-cities.p.rapidapi.com/countries/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())

api_list.name: cities
api_list.description:
In this endpoint you can find every city of a Country by default. All you have to do is add the 'country' parameter when calling the API. The 'country' parameter is the Country Code, like US for the United States, AL for Albania or BR for Brazil. You can get this information from the Countries Endpoint and look for the 'iso2' field.

You can also use the 'states' parameter (alongside with the Country parameter) to fetch cities from a specific state/county from that country.

api_list.name: states
api_list.description: In this endpoint you can find every state/county of a Country by default. All you have to do is add the 'country' parameter when calling the API. The 'country' parameter is the Country Code, like US for the United States, AL for Albania or BR for Brazil. You can get this information from the Countries Endpoint and look for the 'iso2' field.

api_list.name: countries
api_list.description: Fetch every country in the world with this Endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countries-states-and-cities.p.rapidapi.com/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countries-states-and-cities.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
